welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Busogo, Rwanda! Get ready to immerse yourself in the charm and beauty of this city known for its stunning landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Busogo has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gisenyi Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gisenyi Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Goma Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Goma Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but connection may be limited or slow at times.
